title: Breakingviews TV: Malaysia upset
text:
Breakingviews TV: Malaysia upset 10:19am EDT - 04:05
Pete Sweeney and Clara Ferreira Marques discuss why Malaysian voters replaced Prime Minister Najib Razak with 92-year old Mahathir Mohamad, in an election shocker. Was it the 1MDB corruption scandal? Anti-China sentiment? Yes, plus plain old pocketbook voting. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Pete Sweeney and Clara Ferreira Marques discuss why Malaysian voters replaced Prime Minister Najib Razak with 92-year old Mahathir Mohamad, in an election shocker. Was it the 1MDB corruption scandal? Anti-China sentiment? Yes, plus plain old pocketbook voting. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2rGVGK7
